titles.title: To designate the United States Post Office Building located at Bennett and Kansas Avenue in Springfield, Missouri, as the "John Griesemer Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postal Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 2/12/1997--Introduced. Designates the United States Post Office building located at Bennett and Kansas Avenue in Springfield, Missouri, as the John Griesemer Post Office Building.
